== Main Inclusion Report for gnome-keyring-sharp ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' <nowiki>[[http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/g/gnome-keyring-sharp]]</nowiki>; architecture independent.
# ''Rationale:''
** Build dependency of f-spot version 0.4.3.1-1 and later. It was unbundled in this version by the Debian maintainers, previous versions linked against a bundled version.
0. ''Security:''
** No security history.
** No daemons or suid/sgid binaries on its own, but uses gnome-keyring-daemon.
** No network activity.
0. ''Quality assurance:''
** This package has no configuration files.
** This package does not ask any debconf questions.
** <nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/src:gnome-keyring-sharp|Debian bugs]]</nowiki>: none reported.
** <nowiki>[[http://packages.qa.debian.org/g/gnome-keyring-sharp.html|Maintenance in Debian]]</nowiki>: A very old version was <nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi?bug=392427|removed for being obsolete]]</nowiki> from Debian in 2006, and it was only re-added in January as an SVN snapshot.
** <nowiki>[[http://www.mono-project.com/GtkSharp|Upstream]]</nowiki>: This Mono binding is part of Gtk#, which is actively maintained.
** This package does not deal with hardware.
0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki> compliant.
** <nowiki>[[http://www.netfort.gr.jp/~dancer/column/libpkg-guide/libpkg-guide.html|Debian library packaging guide]]</nowiki> is not applicable to Mono libraries.
** Packaging system: cdbs.
** Patch system: simple-patchsys.
** No packaging oddities in sight.
0. ''Dependencies:''
** cli-common, mono, ndesk-dbus
** All dependencies are in main.
0. ''Background information:''
** debian/control provides sufficient information about the general purpose and context of the package. 
** No different names in the past.
